SEARCH
Package main.java.neat.core

Class Neat

java.lang.Object
main.java.neat.core.Neat
public class Neat extends Object
Main class implementing the NEAT algorithm workflow. Handles population management, speciation, evolutionary cycles, and termination conditions. Manages species formation, fitness calculations, and generational evolution.
Author:
Taher Joudeh

    • Neat

      Constructs a NEAT algorithm controller with specified configuration.

  • Method Details

    • getBest

      public Agent getBest()
      Gets the best performing agent found across all generations.
      Returns:
      Agent with highest/lowest fitness (depending on configuration).

    • getPopulation

      public Agent[] getPopulation()
      Returns:
      All the agents in the population.

    • getGeneration

      public int getGeneration()
      Returns:
      The current generation number.

    • getPopulationFitness

      public double getPopulationFitness()
      Returns:
      The population fitness.

    • isTerminated

      public boolean isTerminated()
      Returns:
      True if evolution has met termination conditions.

    • getNumberOfSpecies

      public int getNumberOfSpecies()
      Returns:
      Number of active species in current generation.

    • getCurrentCompatabilityThreshold

      public double getCurrentCompatabilityThreshold()
      Returns:
      Current compatibility threshold for speciation.

    • evolve

      public void evolve(boolean printLastGenerationInfo)
      Executes one evolutionary generation cycle.
      Parameters:
      printLastGenerationInfo - If true, prints generation statistics to console.
